I would choose to become a bird because I love flying and the feeling of freedom it brings. I could soar through the sky and see the world from a new perspective.
I would choose to become a dolphin because I love the water and swimming. I could explore the ocean and play with my new friends.
I would choose to become a butterfly because I love the beauty of nature and the transformation that occurs during metamorphosis.
I would choose to become a lion because I love the power and majesty of theed king of the jungle. I could rule over my pride and protect them from harm.
I would choose to become a sloth because I love the peacefulness and relaxation of spending my days in the trees, napping and eating. I could take life slow and enjoy the simple pleasures.
